pages.text: Utilising $(l:blocks/decorative_andesite)decorative blocks$(), one can craft functional objects used in the creation of Glimmers through $(l:creation/rituals)Rituals$(). These include the andesite bowl, in which suitable $(l:creation/dusts)dusts$() can be placed.
These special capstones are used to finalise pillars, an essential component in creating $(l:creation/rituals)Ritual Locations$().
Likewise using dust and $(l:blocks/decorative_andesite)decorative andesite blocks$(), the central feature of the $(l:creation/rituals)Ritual Location$() is the Ritual RUne.
